About.title: About Me
paragraphs: Passionate and driven, I have a strong interest in finance and mathematics. Currently working as a Technical Project Manager and Software Engineer, I aim to leverage my expertise in project management and development within the finance sector.

I am particularly fascinated by optimization and predictive modeling, encompassing everything from machine learning (regression models to artificial neural networks). Continuously striving to enhance my skills in these areas, my goal is to achieve the best possible outcomes.
Confident in my commitment to excellence and my ability to tackle challenges, I am poised to play a dynamic and influential role in the finance industry.
